titles: The epitaffe of the moste noble [and] valyaunt Iasper late duke of Beddeforde
author: Skelton, John, 1460?-1529, attributed name.
notes: Printer deduced from printer's device, McKerrow 9a, on verso of leaf B4, noted in STC; publication date from Duff.
Verso of leaf B4, which contains printer's device, not filmed.
Reproduction of the original in the Pepys Library.
keywords: Bedford, Jasper Tudor, --  Duke of, 1431?-1495 --  Poetry --  Early works to 1800.
